task: Detect and analyze all other Claude instances working simultaneously on this repository, determine their goals, and establish communication
strategy: Multi-layer detection: (1) git branch pattern analysis, (2) file-based signaling via probes/, (3) integration with existing detection infrastructure, (4) comprehensive reporting
observations: Discovered existing detection protocol in main branch
Identified 2 instances that successfully merged to main
Detected sophisticated multi-layer detection infrastructure already in place
